sentences.en: A dull ache throbbed at the back of David’s head.
A sharp ache developed in her back muscles.
sentences.cn: 她后背的肌肉疼得厉害。

sentences.en: Gosh! My muscles is going to ache all over tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 哎呀! 明天我全身肌肉都会痛了.

sentences.en: He had an awful ache in the belly.
His feet were aching from standing so long.
sentences.cn: 他站了那么久，双脚隐隐作痛。

sentences.en: I feel a dull ache in the shoulder.
sentences.cn: 我的肩膀感到隐约疼痛.

sentences.en: If I get another tummy ache, I will wire you to come.
sentences.cn: 如果我再肚子疼,我会发电报让你来.

sentences.en: It makes one's heart ache to see such waste.
sentences.cn: 这样浪费,真叫人看了心疼.

sentences.en: Mummy, I've got a tummy ache.
My head had begun to ache and my stomach felt funny.
sentences.cn: 我的头开始疼起来，胃也有些不舒服。

sentences.en: Please take the children out, their noise is making my head ache.
sentences.cn: 请把孩子们领出去, 他们吵得我头痛.

sentences.en: Poor posture can cause neck ache, headaches and breathing problems.
sentences.cn: 姿势不当会导致颈部疼痛、头痛和呼吸困难。

sentences.en: Sharpe'sleg and shoulder began to ache, a sure sign of rain.
sentences.cn: 夏普的腿和肩膀开始疼痛，这预示着肯定要下雨了。

sentences.en: She feels an ache in her bosom.
She felt an ache in her back.
The ache in my head abated.
The druggist suggested a preparation to relieve the ache.
sentences.cn: 药剂师建议配一种止痛剂.

sentences.en: The pain, usually a dull ache, gets worse with exercise.
sentences.cn: 通常不明显的疼痛在运动后会加剧。

words.tran_cn: 疼痛；渴望（ache的现在分词形式）

trans.tran_en: a continuous pain that is not sharp or very strong
if part of your body aches, you feel a continuous, but not very sharp pain there
if part of your body aches, you feel a continuous, but not very sharp pain there
